include_directories(../../include)

if ($***REMOVED***ARCH***REMOVED*** STREQUAL "x86_64")
  set(
    MD5_ARCH_SOURCES

    md5-x86_64.$***REMOVED***ASM_EXT***REMOVED***
  )
endif()

if ($***REMOVED***ARCH***REMOVED*** STREQUAL "x86")
  set(
    MD5_ARCH_SOURCES

    md5-586.$***REMOVED***ASM_EXT***REMOVED***
  )
endif()

add_library(
  md5

  OBJECT

  md5.c

  $***REMOVED***MD5_ARCH_SOURCES***REMOVED***
)

perlasm(md5-x86_64.$***REMOVED***ASM_EXT***REMOVED*** asm/md5-x86_64.pl)
perlasm(md5-586.$***REMOVED***ASM_EXT***REMOVED*** asm/md5-586.pl)
